about_the_game:
Color Pixel Heroes - Expansion Pack 1 is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Pixel Coloring has never been this easy!

Features:

• Lots of new amazing artworks in this DLC
• Easy coloring: Enjoy intuitive design and smooth performance of coloring book
• Long press to color continuously which make coloring and drawing more easily.
• Easily color any image you want!

Coloring has never been easier! Just relax and color by Color Pixel Heroes!

Learn how to play:

- Zoom the picture till boxes with numbers appear
- Choose colors in the palette and color boxes with matching numbers
- Use long tap feature to color neighboring cells faster
